body.api:
This version has not been reviewed by our moderation staff and may not be safe for download. 
Disclaimer: We disclaim all responsibility for any harm to your server or system should you choose not to heed this 
warning.

curl._:
Please POST to the attached link to acknowledge this disclaimer and continue to the download. 
curl -O -J -L -d -X "{0}&csrfToken
curl.nocsrf:
Please POST to the attached link to acknowledge this disclaimer and continue to the download. 
curl -O -J -L -d -X "{0}"

confirm.disclaimer: We disclaim all responsibility for any harm to your server or system should you choose not to heed this warning.
confirm.download: Download it at my own risk
confirm.externalUrl: This version download is on an external site.
confirm.nonReviewedChannel: This version will not be reviewed and may not be safe to use.
confirm.reviewedChannel: This version has not been reviewed by our moderation staff yet and may not be safe to use.
confirm.title: Download Warning for
confirm.wget:
Sorry, but Hangar does not support the use of wget. 
Please use the following curl instead: 
curl -O -J -L "<url>"

confirmPartial.api:
This version has only been partially reviewed by our moderation staff and may not be safe for download. 
While the core plugin has been reviewed, other resources like shaded libraries have not. 
Disclaimer: We disclaim all responsibility for any harm to your server or system should you choose not to heed this 
warning.
confirmPartial.reviewedChannel:
This version has only been partially reviewed by our moderation staff and may not be safe for use. 
While the core plugin has been reviewed, other resources like shaded libraries have not.

notice.new: This project is new, and will not be shown to others until a version has been uploaded. If a version is not uploaded over a longer time the project will be deleted.
